exploration_master.description: Finds the shortest path to the nearest unseen tile on the current map using a robust BFS algorithm that handles complex tile types.

path_master_v12.description: A superior pathfinding tool that uses A* search. This version is designed to be more reliable in complex mazes and correctly handles various tile types.

on_screen_impassable_coordinates.description: A JSON string of a list of [x, y] coordinates for on-screen objects to treat as impassable.

extra_impassable_coordinates.description: A JSON string of a list of additional [x, y] coordinates to treat as impassable.

path_master_v13.description: A more robust pathfinding tool using A* search. This version has improved logic for handling complex mazes and one-way tiles.

on_screen_impassable_coordinates.description: A JSON string of a list of [x, y] coordinates for on-screen objects to treat as impassable.

extra_impassable_coordinates.description: A JSON string of a list of additional [x, y] coordinates to treat as impassable.
